Table Generator Cicerone R6 Object

Source: R/mod_tableGen_utils.R
tg_guide.Rd

This object is used within the table generator module to add help text to the various fields using a help buttom

tg_guide

Format

An object of class Cicerone (inherits from R6) of length 13.

See also

Other tableGen Functions: CDISC_anova(), CDISC_chg(), CDISC_freq(), CDISC_mean.ADSL(), CDISC_mean.BDS(), CDISC_mean(), CDISC_methods(), convertTGOutput(), custom_class(), dropArea(), mean_summary(), mod_tableGen_server(), mod_tableGen_ui(), recipe_column(), recipe, rowArea(), rowBlock(), rowPallete()
